alert.note: Alert for Calvert; Charles; Prince Georges; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 8:36PM EDT until July 25 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern St. Marys County in southern Maryland... Southwestern Calvert County in southern Maryland... Southeastern Prince Georges County in central Maryland... East central Charles County in southern Maryland... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 836 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near La Plata, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Leonardtown, Prince Frederick, Sheridan Point, Hallowing Point, Saint Clements Bay, Golden Beach, Saint Leonard, Wicomico, Hughesville, Long Beach, Mechanicsville, Charlotte Hall, Aquasco, Calvert Beach, Bryantown, Benedict, Eagle Harbor, Bushwood, Clements and Port Republic. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Calvert; Charles; Prince Georges; St. Marys
